name: Leonie Scheeren
cv: Leonie Scheeren was a student assistant from April 2018 to March 2019 funded by the Stifterverband (NRW Digital Fellowship 2017). She is an undergraduate student of Mathematics at the RWTH Aachen University. As a student assistant at the CSS-Lab she was primarily tasked with research on developments in the philosophy of mathematics (e.g., automated theorem proving).
